item.title: Balancing Health and Trade: The Scotch Whisky Association ruling on finding the right equilibrium.
item.description:
Angus MacCulloch, Lancaster University Law School The Court of Justice has issued its judgment regarding the legality of Scotland’s minimum alcohol pricing (MUP) measure in Case C-333/14. Both the Scottish Government and the Scotch Whisky Association (SWA), which initiated the legal challenge, have expressed satisfaction with the ruling, although the SWA might be more content as the case now returns to Scotland’s Inner House of the Court of Session, which had referred it to the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/balancing-health-and-trade-the-scotch-whisky-association-ruling-on-finding-the-right-equilibrium/
